name: Ti muoverò
description:
Ti muoverò - I will move you

This is a 2.5D game, you can move a cube with the mouse and keep a ball with you, if the ball recive a shoot and go away... you loose.

To Control the ball you can press mouse1 to actract the ball near you, the actraction force goes down like is showed in the "ui".

You make more points if the ball is closer to you.

I'm italian but i now... my english is perfect.

My name is Luca Ferrari, the game is open source, if you wont to edit it just send a mail at ferrari.luca925@gmail.com to notice me.
